author: ywkao
body:
#### PR description:

This PR includes both the TH2Poly implementation from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41932 and the additional GetArray support for TH2Poly histograms.

The DQMStoreStats::calcstats() method handles bin contents of DQM monitor elements by using the GetArray() method, but the newly integrated TH2Poly histogram type lacks this method.

This PR provides a solution by implementing a custom GetTH2PolyArray() function that extracts bin contents from TH2Poly objects and formats them appropriately for the DQM framework.

#### PR validation:

The GetArray() functionality has been checked using independent C++ code. Additional validation within the CMSSW framework is ongoing.

Note: This PR could potentially supersede #41932 as it contains all those changes plus the GetArray support, as discussed in the PR comments of #41932.
title: Add GetArray support for TH2Poly histograms
